title: Video for Android Wear&YouTube
summary: Video player for Android Wear smartwatches, powered by YouTube
description: Video player for Android Wear smartwatches, powered by YouTube. View YouTube videos on your Android Wear smartwatch. A true wearable entertainment app.Works standalone on Android Wear 2 watches paired with iOS or Android phones. For standalone support install the app from the play store on the watch only.Features:- View videos directly on the watch- Full Bluetooth headphones and speaker support- Cast any video to your Chromecast and use your watch as a remote- Search videos with search predictions- Search related videos- Like a video- View video descriptions- Pause, resume, seek, change volume- Wearable entertainment app- Watch music videos with audio if your watch has a speakerCustomize your YouTube experience, choose channels to show on your watch and get more search results (full version only).IMPORTANT: The Bluetooth headphones/speakers need to be paired with the watch, not with the phone.The Video for Android Wear&YouTube app is compatible with all Android Wear smart watches:- Motorola Moto 360- Sony Smartwatch 3- LG G Watch- LG G Watch R- LG Watch Urbane- LG Watch Urbane 2nd Edition- ASUS ZenWatch- ASUS ZenWatch 2- Huawei Watch- Samsung Gear Live- Fossil Q Founder- TAG Heuer Connected
descriptionHTML:
Video player for Android Wear smartwatches, powered by YouTube. View YouTube videos on your Android Wear smartwatch. A true wearable entertainment app.

Works standalone on Android Wear 2 watches paired with iOS or Android phones. For standalone support install the app from the play store on the watch only.

Features:
- View videos directly on the watch
- Full Bluetooth headphones and speaker support
- Cast any video to your Chromecast and use your watch as a remote
- Search videos with search predictions
- Search related videos
- Like a video
- View video descriptions
- Pause, resume, seek, change volume
- Wearable entertainment app
- Watch music videos with audio if your watch has a speaker

Customize your YouTube experience, choose channels to show on your watch and get more search results (full version only).

IMPORTANT: The Bluetooth headphones/speakers need to be paired with the watch, not with the phone.

The Video for Android Wear&YouTube app is compatible with all Android Wear smart watches:
- Motorola Moto 360
- Sony Smartwatch 3
- LG G Watch
- LG G Watch R
- LG Watch Urbane
- LG Watch Urbane 2nd Edition
- ASUS ZenWatch
- ASUS ZenWatch 2
- Huawei Watch
- Samsung Gear Live
- Fossil Q Founder
- TAG Heuer Connected
comments: Lags out and doesn't register when I choose a channel not to show up in settings
Real laggy but its a cool app. More of a novelty than a convenience at the moment
When I search for a video nothing works if I can't search then what's the point of this app #moto360secondgen #paidverson
It stopped working. Now it lags endlessly.
I can't change my account from my Google+ one, so I can't actually see my subscriptions.
Won't show vid but only sounds
